Question: ONECOM CO., LTD. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ONECOM CO., LTD.

FINTIN V1

- Structured Mini QWERTY technology modularizes 36 keys into 6 keys for blind typing
- Dedicated keys for screen readers and haptic feedback for enhanced user experience
- Enables visually impaired users to access smartphone functions independently
- Plans to extend technology to gaming controllers, XR devices, wearables, and smart TV remotes
- FINTIN XPANDER integrates technology into PS5 DualSense controller for enhanced gaming communication
- Aims to make real-time communication accessible to all without barriers
Summary_cn:
万通有限公司。

FINTIN V1

- 结构化迷你QWERTY技术，将36个按键模块化为6个，用于盲打
- 专用按键供屏幕阅读器使用，并提供触觉反馈，提升用户体验
- 让视障用户独立访问智能手机功能
- 计划将技术扩展到游戏控制器、XR设备、可穿戴设备和智能电视遥控器
- FINTIN XPANDER将技术整合到PS5 DualSense控制器中，以提升游戏沟通
- 旨在让实时沟通对所有人都无障碍可达
